sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { HomeIcon, BuildingOfficeIcon, UsersIcon, LightBulbIcon, CloudArrowUpIcon, Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon, BellIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const navigation = [ { name: 'Dashboard', href: '/', icon: HomeIcon }, { name: 'Accounts', href: '/accounts', icon: BuildingOfficeIcon }, { name: 'Relationships', href: '/relationships', icon: UsersIcon }, { name: 'Intelligence', href: '/intelligence', icon: LightBulbIcon }, { name: 'Salesforce', href: '/salesforce', icon: CloudArrowUpIcon }, ]; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' '); } export default function Layout({ children }) { const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const location = useLocation(); return (
{/* Mobile sidebar */}
setSidebarOpen(false)} />
TS

TheSalesSherpa

AI Sales Intelligence

    • {navigation.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      • ))}
{/* Desktop sidebar */}
TS

TheSalesSherpa

AI Sales Intelligence

    • {navigation.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      • ))}
{/* Status indicator */}
Salesforce Connected
Last sync: 2 hours ago
{/* Main content */}
{/* Top bar */}

{navigation.find(item => item.href === location.pathname)?.name || 'Dashboard'}

{/* Notifications */} {/* User menu */}
ME
Matt Edwards
First Advantage
{/* Page content */}
{children}
); }
